title: My Summer Trip
name: My Summer Trip
description:
A Map by Maxmazor

The places i've visited on my travels back home to Ukraine.

properties.name: Amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorMy family and I were in Amsterdam for about two days. I loved the red light district and the canals.

properties.name: Donetsk
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorWe went here with our family friend Roman on a sight seeing trip.

properties.name: Frankfurt
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorWe had a layover in Frankfurt for a day/night. It is a bustling city with awesome architecture.

properties.name: Kharkiv
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorMy cousin lives in this city. It is one of Ukraine\'s oldest and most beautiful cities.

properties.name: Kiev
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorThis is the capital city of Ukraine. I stayed here for about two weeks in a high rise apartment downtown. My parents\' best friends from childhood live here. It is a beautiful and historic city.

properties.name: Lugansk
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorThis is the city where I was born. My good family friends live here and we stayed here for a good week or so. I visited where i grew up.

properties.name: Moscow
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorThis is the capital of Russia. My uncle is a TV producer here. We drove here and visited him for a while.

properties.name: Novyi Sanjyara
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorMy grandparents lived in this country town. It moves at a very slow pace, very old ideals. Beautiful surroundings.

properties.name: Odesa
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorThis is the seaside town where my grandfather was born. Rich in naval history. I went swimming in the Black Sea from this location.

properties.name: Poltava
properties.description: Posted by MaxmazorThis is the closest city to my grandparents\' house out in the country. It is moderately sized.
